data.title: Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore
meta_keywords: best hotel to stay in singapore
data.meta_description: Located in city centre, Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore is the perfect place to explore Singapore, offering modern rooms, best meeting venues & amenities. Book now!
data.text:
Rated Best Hotel in Robertson Quay, Singapore for Families

Virtual Tour Get Directions

Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore is a premier accommodation option situated serenely on Havelock Road. Offering elegantly appointed rooms and suites offer all the comforts of modern day amenities, replete with award-winning restaurants, seven fully equipped function rooms that can be configured to various meeting arrangements, complete with the latest audiovisual equipment and wireless broadband connectivity.

142 rooms in the Tower Wing were furnished in 2020 with contemporary Chinoiseries décor and in-room technology, offering guests an enhanced experience. Recreational facilities include a landscaped outdoor pool and jacuzzi, mini putting green, gymnasium, sauna and steam bath. The hotel has introduced their exclusive Genie, a technological marvel designed to enhance guests’ experiences. With the smart tablet in selected rooms, guests can hold the power to shape their hotel experience like never before.

Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore is a 4-star business hotel that prides itself on impeccable hospitality, eminent cleanliness and hygiene standards with 311 rooms, Signature Queen, Twin and Studio, Deluxe Queen and Twin with Balcony, Executive Club and Suite.

Just 5 minutes away to Havelock MRT Station (TE16), Chinatown, the Orchard Road shopping belt, Robertson Quay and Clarke Quay nightlife and entertainment districts, Suntec Convention Centre and Marina Bay Financial Centre, we are a stone's throw away from old and new experiences!

Book with us for our Best Price Guarantee, a central location and value for money.

Location:

20 mins or 24 km to Changi International Airport

7 mins or 2.7 km to Orchard Road

3 mins or 240m to Havelock MRT Station (TE16)

4 mins to Tiong Bahru MRT Station (EW17)

5 mins to Robertson Quay

5 mins to Clarke Quay

6 mins to Chinatown

6 mins to Boat Quay

7 mins to Raffles Place

Transport links:

Havelock MRT (5 mins)

Outram Park MRT Station (18 mins)

Tiong Bahru MRT Station (20 mins)

Clarke Quay MRT (21 mins)

Outram Park MRT to Changi Airport (55 mins)

Nearby Attractions:

Boat Quay, Chinatown, Clarke Quay, Fort Canning, Havelock Road, Little India, Marina Bay, Orchard Road, Robertson Quay, Tiong Bahru

Nearby Expressways:

Ayer Rajah Expressway

Central Expressway

East Coast Expressway

Amenities:

Complimentary Tour – a project collaboration brought to you by Copthorne King’s Hotel and Singapore Tourism Board (visit historical and cultural sites in Fort Canning, Joo Chiat, Tiong Bahru)

FX auto machine available 24/7

Book direct for the best rate

When you book direct, not only will you get The Best Rate, but also the best rewards, the best stay and the best room. That means you’ll get the best experience you possibly can.

An experience that’s enhanced by a 5% discount for MyMillennium members. You’ll even get points to spend on room upgrades, gifts and more. And the offer doesn’t end there – you’ll enjoy up to 20% off all food and drink options available at Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore.

Find Out More

We are GSTC Certified

Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore continues to showcase our steadfast commitment to environmental stewardship. From energy-efficient practices to eco-friendly initiatives, every aspect of our operations is meticulously designed to minimize our carbon footprint while maximizing guest comfort. Experience unparalleled comfort and eco-conscious hospitality at Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore, where every stay is a step towards a greener future.

The Best Meeting Rooms and Event Venues in Singapore

With the picturesque Singapore River as their backdrop, our 5 versatile Singapore meeting rooms are the ideal location for an inspiring event. All our event venues and meeting rooms come complete with audiovisual equipment and high speed Wi-Fi. Our Events Team will take care of all the fine details so you can focus on having a successful event at Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore.
